title: Wind Cave National Park: Photos & Multimedia
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia             Photos & Multimedia         Karen Rosga sets up a camera to take a picture in Wind Cave NPS Photo by Jim Pisarowicz  Here you can visit the park through pictures and videos. On these pages you can experience the sights and sounds of Wind Cave National Park through an assortment of materials ranging from photo galleries to video clips, and PowerPoint programs. However, there is no substitute for actually going into the cave and smelling the moist, earthy air or sitting in the prairie as the sun warms your face.  Explore these links and let yourself become inspired to make a greater exploration, in person, to one of the world's longest, most complex caves and the overlying windswept prairie.  Photo Gallery Videos PowerPoint Programs  Commercial photography or filming in the park may need a special use permit.  Click here for information about a special use permit for photography or filming.
